decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: Revised plans Rec. 17.4.2024 Proposed Floor Plans drawing no. 17 Chaworth 06 Rev A, Proposed Roof Plan drawing no.17 Chaworth 07 Rev A and Proposed Elevations drawing no.17 Chaworth 08 Rev A
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building and shall be consistent with those listed within the submitted application form and the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Development Management DPD (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), Policy DAA of Ealing's Local Plan (Reg.19) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012).
| No part of the roof of the existing extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), policies 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), policy DAA of Ealing's Local Plan (Reg.19) and policies 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy ( | Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2024 (as amended) or any subsequent amendment or new order, no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.

Reason: To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policy DAA of Ealing's Local Plan 2023 (Reg.19), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023)(Updated).
description: Part single and part two storey side and rear wrap around extension (following demolition of existing single storey rear extension) and front porch extension
